Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Relates to taxes on gross receipts from ticket sales, broadcasting rights and digital streaming over the internet of combative sport events
Summary: Relates to taxes on gross receipts from ticket sales, broadcasting rights and digital streaming over the internet of combative sport events.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to taxes on gross receipts from ticket sales, broadcasting rights and digital streaming over the internet of combative sport events
